mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO RESUME (RESUMESEQ, MEMBERID,RESUMETITLE, RECRUIT_STATUS, RESUMEIMAGE, NEWRESUMEIMAGE, RESUME_INTRO_TITLE, RESUME_INTRO_CONTENT, PORTFOLIO, NEWPORTFOLIO, DESIREDSALARY, DESIREDJOBTYPE, DESIRED_STR, DESIRED_END, DESIREDAREA1, DESIREDJOB1, GENDER) VALUES (RESUME_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{dto.memberid}, #{dto.resumetitle}, #{dto.recruit_status}, #{dto.resumeimage}, #{dto.newresumeimage}, #{dto.resume_intro_title}, #{dto.resume_intro_content}, #{dto.portfolio}, #{dto.newportfolio}, #{dto.desiredsalary}, #{dto.desiredjobtype}, #{dto.desired_str}, #{dto.desired_end}, #{dto.desiredarea1}, #{dto.desiredjob1}, #{dto.gender} )
